roleset.name: highly skilled

example.name: adept-j: both args
example.text: Japan is adept at consummating a double - faceted strategy toward China . In the military security aspect , Japan is aggressive and maintains a great political and security tension .
example.arg: consummating a double - faceted strategy toward China

roleset.note: ADEPT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from adept.01-j)
